command: source ~/.config/aidevops/credentials.sh && docker run -i --rm -v /tmp:/tmp -e UNSTRACT_API_KEY -e API_BASE_URL -e DISABLE_TELEMETRY=true unstract/mcp-server:${UNSTRACT_IMAGE_TAG:-latest} unstract
unstract._comment: Disabled globally. Enabled on-demand via services/document-processing/unstract.md. Requires UNSTRACT_API_KEY and API_BASE_URL in credentials.sh. Pin image with UNSTRACT_IMAGE_TAG env var for reproducibility.
